Text: I have a v3.90 Beta 1 catalog of 6TB...

Catalogs created with this v3.90 Beta 1 can not be used with the final v3.90

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3931431/WhereIsIt.v3.90-YAG
Has anybody had this version longer than 30 days other than the poster? Does it still work or not?

DO NOT USE! Use older versions that are portable or cracked. Even older versions are known to become 'Unregistered' after Whereisit? 'phones home' to check the serial#, and if found to be blacklisted, it will password protect your records with UN: warezuser, PW: unknown (probably random). Starting with 3.90, in addition to locking your data files, it will give you a fake BSOD when you attempt to read the catalog of a new disc into your records.
You've been warned.
What RAMchipz said didn't happen to me with the versions I posted here. It was Final v3.90 that did block my catalogs.
